com.tealium.internal.tagbridge

Class TagBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tealium.internal.tagbridge.TagBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddRemoteCommandListener, BackgroundListener, RemoveRemoteCommandListener, java.util.EventListener

    public final class TagBridge
extends java.lang.Object
implements AddRemoteCommandListener, RemoveRemoteCommandListener
    This class evaluates TagBridge invocations, caches client-provided commands, and dynamically loads and caches stock TagBridge commands.
    Since:
    2014-11-11
